title: Light Conspiracy Theories
description: Leah and Kate catch up on all SCOTUS-related "antics" that happened in March-- including the latest in Ginni Thomas news [00:55], opinions [25:06], oral arguments [40:23], and non-Thomas-related news [52:56].
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
